summary: BuildRequest specifies no requirements and explicitly calls for a no-op regarding the contact form. The diff only modifies project_state.json by adding/updating a set of portfolio/SEO/contact-form related features with REQ-1..REQ-6, which are not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated multiple 'existing_features' entries (e.g., mobile-first portfolio site, sticky header nav, section structure, on-page/technical SEO, and a contact inquiry form requirement) with REQ-1 through REQ-6 in project state, despite the BuildRequest having no requirements and being a no-op.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest states Requirements: none and Non-goals include not adding a new contact form UI; the diff introduces new scoped requirements/features in the project state that were not requested.
